sub_title: Conscious Leadership Strategist                  | Multidimensional Wellbeing Systems Design Architect |
summary:
She works at the transdisciplinary nexus of Wellbeing, Business, Architecture, Science, Behavioural Psychology, Technology, Metaphysics, Philosophy and Spirituality. 

Integrating the natural, social and health sciences in a humanities context transversing traditional boundaries. Catalysing Systems Change.

Wonny is the founder of Spirited@Work, inspiring Conscious Leadership in Multidimensional Wellbeing in body (physical), mind (mental), heart (emotional), soul (individual) and spirit (universal/cosmic/collective).

Her current activities are focused on:
+ steering the global narrative towards collective Wellbeing
+ researching leadership for future generations

----------------

Interests in projects in: 
Smart Cities, Architecture, Technology, Sustainable Business, Innovation, Social Impact Investing & Built Environment & Architecture

Feel free to connect if it's something totally different.

-----------------

She is trained as a: 
- Behavior Change Strategist - gedragsveranderaar
- Martha Beck life coach
- Eden Method (Eden Energy Medicine) Practitioner & Teacher 
- Shamanic Energy Medicine Practitioner 
- Tibetan Medicine Counselor

Additional trainings in: 
+ Medicinal Qigong
+ BioGeometry (Physics of Quality - Sacred Geometry) 
+ Tibetan Medicine & Mantra Healing
+ Sociocracy (in training)
+ Post Growth Entrepreneurship Train-the-Trainer 
+ Post Growth Entrepreneurship Incubator

Academic training
+ Doctorandus in Sinology (Sinologist)
+ Account Management certification
+ Bachelor in Modern Japanese Studies

+++++++++++++++++

https://practitioner.edenmethod.com/listing/wonny-tjon/
https://connect.wellbeing-project.org/profile?uid=16N4zSRFiDfPxB5PJ5HedqGdJYg1
www.spiritedatwork.com

projects.title: Friesland Bank Migration to Rabobank, Programme `Centraal Dossier Loket`
projects.description:
Client- and Product Migration of the Corporate and Commercial Banking segment of the Programme `Centraal Dossier Loket` (CDL) of the Friesland Bank 

+ Project Addenda/Control, 7-11/10/2013
+ Project Special Asset Management, 19/09/-04/10/2013                                
+ Project Management Officer, Single Point of Contact (SPOC), 2-18/09/2013
+ Project Management Coordinator, Project Bank Guarantees, 12-30/08/2013
+ Quality Controller Corporate and Commercial Banking, CDL 06-07/2013
+ File Migration Specialist Corporate and Commercial Banking 03/2013-06/2013

The purpose of the project is to digitalize and migrate the Client and Productdata of the Corporate Clients and Commercial Banking segment of the Friesland Bank to the local Rabobanks, according to the Rabobank guidelines.

projects.title: Rabobank Central South Limburg, Project Records Management
projects.description:
Project Records Management, Rabobank Central South Limburg.
Intern Accountmanager Bedrijven, KRM		                 10/2012 – 01/2013

The purpose of the project is to optimize data quality management and to create an accurate representation of the financial records in the systems for the internal stakeholders of the business segment commercial banking.
-	Data quality management, assessment and evaluation of Commercial Banking segment financial records (450 client files) up to €1 million accordingly and work closely with the account managers.
- Monitor, check and correct omissions in Siebel and BBS.

contributors.headline: Conscious Leadership Strategist                  | Multidimensional Wellbeing Systems Design Architect |

profile_positions.description:
Spirited@Work is specialised in designing Multidimensional Wellbeing through Conscious  Leadership.

We help organisations to transmute the Energy of their business with Conscious Leadership in Excellence of Action. 

+++++++++++++++++
Vision: Multidimensional Wellbeing in Mind, Body, Heart, Soul & Spirit 

Mission: Inspire Conscious Leadership in Excellence of Action 

Specialisation: Holistic Technologies for Wellbeing based on primordial & ancient knowledge and wisdom (Traditional Chinese Medicine, Tibetan Medicine, Ayurvedic, Celtic and Shamanic teachings).
+++++++++++++++++

Spirited@Work
+ Develops Technologies of Transformation for Conscious Leadership
+ Transdisciplinary approach integrating multiple disciplines economic, social, tech sciences & spirituality in a human context transcending traditional boundaries.

+ improve the quality of decision making from wisdom
+ create trust
+ organisational effectiveness, inspire to achieve shared objectives and well-being
+ feel more fulfilment, belonging, purpose and joy in work
+ enhance overall performance, engagement
+ facilitate more focus, clarity, transparency and efficiency 
+ cultivate and instill a safe and nourishing environment for teams to thrive, create and innovate sustainable solutions
+ simple techniques for more focus, clarity and purpose in personal and professional life

www.spiritedatwork.com

profile_positions.title: Account Manager Logistica 2017 (Interim)

profile_positions.description:
+ sales and account management activities for VIV Europe 2018 approximate €365.000 in sales, 1600 m2
+ assisting Chinese delegation in the food industry visiting Dutch Poultry industries

VIV EUROPE 2018 connects 600 organizations from 45 countries and covers the entire food chain from primary production to finished products: from Feed to Meat. It aims to help build Sustainable Food Businesses Worldwide. VIV Europe 2018 is a platform where all participants in meat production can work together to provide safe, healthy and nutritious food. 
VIV Europe 2018’s theme is Data Driven Poultry Production. 

https://www.viv.net/events/viv-europe-2018-utrecht
profile_positions.title: International Account Manager VIV Europe 2018 (Interim)

profile_positions.description:
+ New Business Development Sub-Saharan African Poultry Market
+ Bridging international supply and  the growing demand of poultry in Sub-Saharan (East, West and Central) Africa in Kigali
+ Helping international businesses pioneer the newly developing Sub-Saharan poultry market
+ Bringing Poultry Leadership Development in Sub-Saharan Africa.

http://www.poultryafrica2017.com

-----
VIV is the global brand of trade shows, conferences and events based on the 'Feed to Meat' supply chain. The multi-specie event includes the sectors of Poultry, Pig, Cattle & Calves and Aquaculture. VIV is set up from Feed to Meat involving all sectors in the animal protein production chain. VIV events are platforms where all participants in meat production can work together to provide the guarantees consumers are demanding. 

Specialties: trade shows, trade summits, and international networking
Our trade shows and trade summits: VIV Asia,  VIV Europe, VIV MEA, VIV China, VIV Russia, Poultry Summit Europe, Poultry Summit Latin America

VIV, the business network linking producers from feed to food

company.name: The Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences (KNAW)

profile_positions.company: KNAW - Koninklijke Nederlandse Akademie van Wetenschappen
profile_positions.description:
-	Facilitated the matchmaking of 27 selected PhD candidates of the Talent and Training China-Netherlands programme in the Netherlands in cooperation with the Netherlands Organisation for Scientific Research (NWO) to improve the quality and quantity of doctoral research at universities and research institutes in the Netherlands. 
-	Acted as the go-between the Netherlands (NWO and KNAW) and China (China Scholarship Council (CSC) and the Dutch Embassy to promote, expand and deepen Sino-Dutch scientific cooperation. 
-	Monitored the progress of the PhD-candidates of the CAS-KNAW Joint PhD Training Programme in joint research projects of the KNAW and the Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS).
-	Supported the activities of the China Desk and international prizes, subsidies and exchange agreements (Visiting Professors Programme, Conference Grants fund, Lindau Nobel Laureate Meetings, Fulbright Scholar Grant).

Acted as an intermediary between the Netherlands Organisation for International Cooperation in Higher Education (Nuffic), the Dutch institutes and the applicants.
